Summary   - Application Support   
Skilled, dynamic and qualified IT professional with hands-on experience for 9 years in Production Support – Linux by 
implementing, installing and troubleshooting system architecture in areas of product deployments and software platform, 
seeking an aspiring position in Application support in a renowned IT environment.

Remedy, Opsview, Dynatrace.
